title: ULTRASOUND AND THE ALVARADO SCORE FOR DIAGNOSING ACUTE APPENDICITIS
details: S Hdra - Libyan Journal of Medical Research, 2024
abstract: Background: the signs and symptoms associated with acute appendicitis are determined by the Alvarado score with a numerical value. The Alvarado score is practically equivalent to the clinical suspicion score. On the other hand, ultrasound is …
